Legal_Rule: A trademark is 'in use' if it is marked on wares or packaging during a normal commercial transaction

Procedural_Issue: Scope of appeal and admissibility of additional evidence

Outcome_on_Merits: Trademark CAMBRIDGE was found to be in use; registration upheld
Review_Standard: Assessment of whether the Registrar’s decision was supported by evidence
